qualities: Several XAI surveys report that there is no ubiquitous consensus on appropriate desiderata.
Some categories related to goals pursued through XAI, rather than standalone desiderata of XAI.
Desiderata categories include Trustworthiness, Acceptance, or Fairness.
Langer et al. (2021) reported desiderata categories.
Elkhawaga et al. (2023) reported desiderata categories.
A scoping review is conducted to report main desiderata used by different authors.
Similarities and differences in desiderata formulations are analyzed.
Some papers listed in Table 1 are excluded due to overlap or different desiderata.
Awal & Roy (2024) and Klein et al. (2024) papers overlap considerably.
Sovrano et al. (2021) uses a different notion of desiderata.
A set of seven desiderata is proposed to serve as a categorization scheme for VXAI.
The proposed framework is principled and practical.
Prior frameworks are too narrow or too broad.
Properties beyond explainability are included in prior frameworks.
Fairness is often measured using XAI methods.
Fairness assesses the model's behavior rather than the explanation itself.
